description.german: Punche einen Feind für 10 Sekunden ohne dass er den Boden berührt

description.english: Kill a helicopter penguin with his own missile

description.french: Tue un hélicoptère pingouins avec son propre missile

description.dutch: Dood een helikopterpinguïn met zijn eigen raket

description.english: Escape the large zeppelin with 40 seconds or more on the timer

description.spanish: Escapa del zepelín grande con 40 segundos o más en el cronómetro
description.schinese: 计时器上留下最少40秒的时间逃离大飞艇
description.tchinese: 計時器上留下最少40秒的時間逃離大飛艇

description.portuguese: Escape do grande zeppelin com 40 segundos ou mais no tempo
description.dutch: Ontsnap uit de grote zeppelin met 40 seconden of meer op de timer

description.english: Kill 30 Penguins as they step out of a door

description.french: Tue 30 pingouins quand ils passent la porte

description.tchinese: 殺死30隻剛踏出門的企鵝

description.dutch: Dood 30 pinguïns als ze een deur uitkomen

displayName.japanese: ブレインバグ・フィーバー

description.german: Verwende bei 30 Feinden Kontroll-Käfer
description.french: Bug cerveau 30 ennemis
description.italian: 30 nemici Brainbug
description.spanish: Usar Granadas Cerebrales en 30 enemigos

description.tchinese: 為30個敵人植入迷魂蟲
description.japanese: 敵を３０羽ブレインバグする
description.portuguese: Chacoalhe o cérebro de 30 inimigos
description.dutch: Gebruik 30 keer een brain bug

description.english: Brainbug the penguin above the star in Chapter 6 (Single Player)
description.german: Verwende in Kapitel 6 (Einzelspieler) beim Pinguin über dem Stern einen Kontroll-Käfer
description.french: Bug cerveau le pingouin en dessus de l'étoile dans le Chapitre 6 (Un joueur)
description.italian: Brainbug il pinguino sopra la stella nel Capitolo 6 (giocatore singolo)
description.koreana: 챕터 6에서 별 위에 있는 펭귄에게 브레인버그 사용 (싱글 플레이)
description.spanish: Usar Granadas Cerebrales en al pingüino encima de la estrella en el Capítulo 6 (Un Jugador)
description.schinese: 在第六章中为黑星上的企鹅植入迷魂虫（单人游戏）
description.tchinese: 在第六章中為黑星上的企鵝植入迷魂蟲（單人遊戲）

description.portuguese: Chacoalhe o cérebro do pinguim acima da estrela no Capítulo 6 (Jogador único)
description.dutch: Gebruik een brain bug op de pinguïn boven de ster in Hoofdstuk 6 (Solo spel)

description.german: Töte 20 Feinde, während du einen Kontroll-Käfer bei ihnen anwendest
description.french: Tue 20 ennemi en buguant le cerveau
description.italian: Uccidi 20 nemici con Brain bug
description.spanish: Mata a 20 enemigos después de Granadas Cerebrales
description.schinese: 植入迷魂虫时杀死20个敌人
description.tchinese: 植入迷魂蟲時殺死20個敵人
description.japanese: ブレインバグ中に敵を２０羽殺す
description.portuguese: Mate 20 inimigos enquanto chacoalha o cérebro
description.dutch: Dood 20 vijanden met brain bugs

description.english: Brainbug at least one penguin from each of the 7 penguin ranks, including Putzki
description.german: Wende Kontroll-Käfer bei mindestens einem Pinguin jedes der 7 Pinguinränge an, einschließlich Putzki
description.french: Bug cerveau au moins un pingouin de chacun des 7 rangs de pingouin, Putzki inclus

description.koreana: 푸츠키를 포함하여 7개의 각기 다른 펭귄 서열에 속한 적에게 브레인버그 사용하기
description.spanish: Usar Granadas Cerebrales en al menos a un pingüino de cada una de las 7 filas de pingüinos, incluyendo a Putzki
description.schinese: 为每个等级的至少一只企鹅植入迷魂虫，包括噗子基
description.tchinese: 為每一個等級的企鵝至少一隻植入迷魂蟲，包括噗子基

description.portuguese: Chacoalhe o cérebro de pelo menos um pinguim de cada uma das sete fileiras de pinguins, incluindo Putzki
description.dutch: Brainbug een pinguin van elke penguin rank, inclusief Putzki

description.german: Töte Brno mit dem Messer

description.english: Carry the other cooperative player for 500 meters in the same chapter without dying

description.tchinese: 在同一章中背著合作玩家前進500米而不死

description.german: Schlag oder tritt 100 Mal

description.tchinese: 打或踢100次

description.dutch: Sla of schop 100 keer

description.english: Kill 10 enemies, each with one gunshot

description.tchinese: 殺死10個敵人，一擊殺死一個

description.english: Kill an enemy by knocking him into a laser door

description.tchinese: 將敵人撞入鐳射門，殺死他

description.portuguese: Mate um inimigo batendo-o em uma porta de laser
description.dutch: Dood een vijand door hem in een laserdeur te slaan

description.english: Stack all 3 crates near the end of Chapter 11 (Single Player)

description.tchinese: 在第十一章末尾堆起全部的三隻箱子（單人遊戲）

description.english: Kill all penguins stationed on the zeppelin in Chapter 3 (Single Player)
